revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SetGravity}} '''A_SetGravity''' (float ''gravity'')
Sets the amount of {{Property|Gravity|gravity}} for the calling actor.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
== See also == *[[A_NoGravity]] *[[A_LowGravity]] *[[A_Gravity]]
{{DEFAULTSORT:SetGravity}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
